definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
Cupid, son of Venus and Mars, Roman god of love and beauty
The Hobbit by J.R.R. Tolkien 托爾金|托尔金

sentences.english: Cupid shot the leaden -pointed arrow straight at Daphne's heart.
sentences.chinese: 邱比特举起那支铅头的箭，对准戴芙妮的心射过去。

sentences.english: Am I trying to do the job that cupid or God suppose to do?
sentences.chinese: 我是否尝试著做上帝跟邱比特的工作？

sentences.english: Now, only the light of one small hobbit's faith can save the world.
sentences.chinese: 现在只有一个小霍比特人的信仰之光能拯救世界了。

sentences.english: I hold the Cupid's arrow chasing you, you're wearing a bulletproof vest to fly.
sentences.chinese: 我举着丘比特的箭追呀追，你穿着防弹背心飞呀飞。

sentences.english: The private key is used to access the Bitcoins kept in the payor's account.
sentences.chinese: 私钥用于访问比特币付款人的账户。

sentences.english: Stupid Cupid, stop pickin on me!
sentences.chinese: 无聊的丘比特，不要再找上我了。

sentences.english: Hop a fast train and sit back - Cupid will be waiting for you when you get to your destination.
sentences.chinese: 乘上火车出行吧，丘比特在终点等待你呢。

sentences.english: Her Cupid-bow mouth pouted to give him an airy kiss.
sentences.chinese: 她那丘比特型的嘴一撅，像是要给他送一个飞吻。

sentences.english: The Nobel committee called George Babbitt the popular hero of the American middle class.
sentences.chinese: 诺贝尔委员会称，主人公巴比特是中产阶级的偶像。

sentences.english: It transmits about 120 gigabytes of information every week.
sentences.chinese: 它每周传回大约120吉比特的信息。

sentences.english: God blesses you that you will be shot with Cupids arrow in a short time!
sentences.chinese: 神佑，丘比特之箭会在不久的明天插入你的心扉。

sentences.english: To the Roman's he was Cupid, and his mother was Venus.
sentences.chinese: 在古罗马神话中，他就叫做丘比特，其母是维纳斯。

sentences.english: Either a bit- or byte-oriented format may be used.
sentences.chinese: 它的格式可以是一比特的或者一字节的。

sentences.english: Otherwise, you're wasting a bit, so to speak, unnecessarily.
sentences.chinese: 否则，你就浪费了一个比特位，也就多余了。

sentences.english: It was not brought about by accident, but by the malice of Cupid (Eros).
sentences.chinese: 事情的发生绝非偶然，而是邱比特故意搞的鬼。

sentences.english: Can set convert quality, sample rate , bitrate.
sentences.chinese: 可以设置转换质量，采样率，比特率。

definition: Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
to encrypt/encryption/to protect with a password
megabyte (2^20 or approximately a million bytes)
token (used instead of money for slot machines, in game arcades etc)
